subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: One of the strangest stories of the 2008-9 N.B.A. season has to be the Memphis Grizzlies’ kicking the tires of Darius Miles to see if he has anything left, while the Portland Trail Blazers sit back and hope that he does not.
snippet: One of the strangest stories of the 2008-9 N.B.A. season has to be the Memphis Grizzlies’ kicking the tires of Darius Miles to see if he has anything left, while the Portland Trail Blazers sit back and hope that he does not.
